titleInfo.title: Brother Henry Claude Stock and Student

mods.abstract: Brother Claude was the first full-time faculty member for mechanical engineering and the head of the department. He arrived at CBC for the 1955-1956 academic year. The following year a Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering was added to the college's new four-year curriculum. In 1960, he oversaw the installation of mechanical engineering equipment and laboratories in Benilde Hall.
